channel.title: Rune c bow
channel.description: how do i make rune c bow spec hit higher it hits crappy right now does anybody know how to fix rune c bow to make it hit higher

item.title: Rune c bow
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:13, topic:310867”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=407329.msg3009121#msg3009121 date=1256623684]
You are all complete idiots, and don’t know how to do anything! Everyone that posted above!

First search:

int maxRangeHit()

then scroll down and you see some lines like:

if(hasCrystalBow())
{
d *= 1.5D;

scroll down until you see:

if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837))

the 837 is the id number for your rune crossbow

change the
d *= 2.9D;

to whatever you like, the higher it is, the harder it hits…

There, was that so hard?

[/quote]

That arrogance part was uncalled for. I approved your post because it was helpful. I am replying to it because it was also hurtful. If you continue to traipse around this forum like a pompous ass, you are going to be forced out of this community. I hope I have made myself clear, as this is your final chance to redeem yourself.[/quote]

i disagree, im Russian and in my tradition, if a person lies to you, they are trying to set you onto the right path that you cannot see, if a person insults you, then they are trying to make you correct errors.

unfortunately everyone in this country or in other countries lie to seek personal gain, so the lie part doesn’t apply, but the insult is hurtful but it will teach other posters to not post over confidently and not to post things they don’t know, and the insult didn’t contain any bad language and was helpful, they didn’t know how to change max hits, so he called them idiots but now they do know so they became less idiotic. so in overall his post helped them learn something.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune c bow

item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

now my d claws problem does anybody got the code public void specdamg and public void specnpcdamg for a delta 317 base anybody i need these commands to make d claws hit 4 times it shows 4 numbers but 3 are 0s and 1 is a number and all my specs that hit 2 liek d hally and d bow the 2nd number of spec dont hit i know it has to do with that can anybody supply me with this code.

Read full topic

change the

If you continue to traipse around this forum like a pompous ass, you are going to be forced out of this community. I hope I have made myself clear, as this is your final chance to redeem yourself.
